TopicTitle: This is what happens when jeb is in charge

Articles.Content: ![screenshot4.png](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-gUeM4F_i0r4/VSQN3EQJc5I/AAAAAAAAACo/4vfdOTBr_Wo/w426-h240/screenshot4.png)Well what your gonna do? (Insert witty 90s space joke here) ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) and he blew the engine. Now how will we get back home? Never let jeb take control of missions please ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif) this has been a PSA for the anti jeb organization. (Fake donate button) okay for real shift keys appeared and my ship flipped out of control and the engine blew up and now I need a plan to save them. any ideas?
Well, if you ask me, I think he's an imposter.
first of all, answer a question with a question...what game mode are you playing in?
But in sandbox? in career? in hardcore? in sandbox? Bill 13:37 the confusion
Ok, in sandbox, I would send a robotic lander to go out and rescue them. It is the safest option. They still have food and water in the lander they have (even though it tipped over).

Send another ship, duh. But learn to fly better or else this:

![2012-06-22-episode-ten-stranded-squared.png](http://www.kerbalcomics.com/comics/2012-06-22-episode-ten-stranded-squared.png)
